1600860.name: Wordeous - Sports Pack
1600860.description:
Did you played all the words which comes with the starter pack again and again? Do you want to play more? Unlock 200 new words with this Sports Pack! By getting this free pack pack you will have access to 200 new words in "SPORTS" category in addition to the starter pack words. This Sports Pack will give you hours of gameplay. New words, new possibilities!

The sports pack includes words related to football, basketball, american football, hockey, tennis, racing and olympics. There are team, player and coach names, terms and equipment names available in the pack.
